Electricity generation.Description: Electricity generation can rely on renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and geothermal power.
Electricity generation often relies on fossil fuels like coal, oil, and natural gas, although this is not sustainable in the long term.
Some countries generate electricity through nuclear power plants, which use nuclear reactions to produce heat and generate electricity.
Hydropower plants generate electricity by harnessing the energy of flowing or falling water.
